name: Kurtzy Heavy Duty Padlock with 4 Keys - Hardened Solid Steel Hardware Monoblock Lock - 12mm Thick Shackle - Protector Lock for Garage Door, Containers, Sheds, Shutters, Lockers, Gates and Warehouses
short_description: HEAVY DUTY STEEL LOCK: This lock is made of hardened steel to keep your contents safe and the bad guys out. The lock weighs a heavy 850g and measures L10 x W2.4 x H6.5cm (3.94 x 0.94 x 2.56 inches). The shackle measures 12 mm in diameter. When locked the gap measures L3.9cm x H2cm (1.54 x 0.79 inches). This makes this padlock the perfect size for most latches.

ULTIMATE SECURITY: Weighing at a mighty 850g this lock is super tough. With its hardened, solid steel body it makes it high strength and extremely durable. It has a rotating shackle/closed shackle making this lock anti-drill and anti-saw. The lock has been designed with security in mind leaving no weak spots.

4 KEYS INCLUDED: All of the padlocks sold come with 4 keys. You can never have enough spares. Keep a few in a safe place so you are covered if you lose one. With 4 keys, you will have enough to give to close friends and family members. Keys can only be removed from the lock when it is in the locked position.

LOCKUP AND LEAVE: Given the unique D shape of the lock it makes it the perfect solution for securing industrial 20ft or 40ft containers as well as gates, garage doors, caravans and storage units. Also being very sturdy the lock can be used when locking up the chain on your motorbikes.

DESIGNED FOR LIFE: Every product in our collection is built with purpose, blending function and style. Our thoughtfully crafted designs ensure lasting reliability and convenience when needed, ideal for any occasion.

name: 4 Pack 2.5 Inch(65mm) Heavy Duty Solid Steel Keyed Alike Padlocks,Chrome Plated Long Hardened Steel Shackle High Security Padlock for Gates,Storage,Toolboxes
short_description: Keyed Alike Convenience: One Key Fits AllStreamline your security with our 4-pack keyed alike system. Each set includes 8 identical keys that open all 4 locks, eliminating the frustration of carrying a bulky keychain. Perfect for multi-gate properties, commercial units, toolboxes, and storage lockers where quick access is a priority.

Heavy-Duty Solid Steel Construction: Engineered for maximum physical defense, these 2.5-inch (65mm) padlocks are forged from high-strength solid steel. The massive body and hardened steel shackle provide superior resistance against bolt cutters, saws, and prying, making them a formidable deterrent for high-risk areas.

Advanced Security Pick-Resistant Core: Equipped with a precision 4-pin brass cylinder and an anti-drill shackle, our locks are designed to outsmart common picking and tampering techniques. The dual-locking lever mechanism ensures the shackle remains secure even under intense physical stress, trusted by both homeowners and contractors.

Enhanced Surface Protection for Versatile Use: Featuring a thickened chrome-plated finish, these locks are built to handle various environments. While designed for robust outdoor and indoor use, the solid steel core provides the heavy-duty weight you need for gates and warehouses. Note: To maintain peak performance in extreme wet conditions, a periodic drop of lubricant in the keyhole is recommended.

Exceptional Value & Commitment to Quality: Get professional-grade security at an unbeatable price. We stand behind our heavy-duty hardware; if you encounter any issues with functionality or performance, our dedicated support team is here to provide a quick resolution. Secure your property with confidence and industrial-strength reliability.
product_description: 2.5" Heavy Duty Solid Steel Construction: Built with 2.5-inch (65mm) thick solid steel bodies and chrome-plated hardened shackles, these padlocks resist bolt cutters, sawing, and extreme force. Ideal for securing high-value items in demanding environments.

name: BRINKS - 44mm Commercial Laminated Steel Weather Resistant Padlock with 2 3/8” Shackle - TPE Wrapped and Hardened Boron Steel Shackle
short_description: FEATURES: Brink’s Commercial Laminated Steel Weather Resistant Padlock has a 44mm body with hardened Boron steel shackle for cut resistance; The entire lock has a TPE soft-touch elastomeric coating for use in wet climate and/or harsh environments.

SECURITY: Equipped with a five-pin brass tumbler cylinder, double stainless steel ball mechanism for pick and pry resistance, and a key cylinder cover to keep dirt and grime out for long lasting performance.
STRENGTH: Steel shackle has a cut strength up to 9700 lbs.

IDEAL USAGE: Its superior corrosion resistance makes it perfect for use in any wet climate and the harshest environments. Ideal to use to secure doors, gates, sheds, trailers, storages, chains and other items subjected to the elements.
QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST: A global leader in security-related products and services, the Brink's name is synonymous with top quality products to keep you and your belongings safe.
product_description: Brink’s Commercial Weather Resistant XT Plus Padlock features a laminated steel 44mm body and a semi-matte Boron steel shackle. The padlock is equipped with a 4-pin tumbler cylinder, dual stainless-steel locking bar for increased pick and pry resistance and a key cylinder cover to keep dirt and grime out for long lasting performance. A full body, TPE elastomeric bumper completes the look with an enhanced weather resistant lock body cover to provide protection against the elements. The padlock can be use indoors or outdoors. With its superior corrosion resistance, it is perfect for use in any wet climate and the harshest environments. The padlock is ideal to secure doors, gates, sheds, trailers, storages, chains and other items subjected to the elements.
